task.title: Accept Request as a Guide
task.shortdesc: Respond to and accept a travler's request on

step.cmd: Filter requests by category, adte or location if needed.
Tap on a request to view full details.
Send a proposal with your availability, rate and additional notes.
Tap Accept once you agree to the terms with the traveler.

result.p: The traveler will be notified and can confirm your offer.
